name: KABLOOMATOIDS
description:
KABLOOMATOIDS is a game about KABLOOM-ing some aliens. The aliens come in waves every 20 seconds to try and defeat your spaceship. There was so much more planned for the game- but because of the time restraint we made do! The team and I are really proud of the product!
-Jhonxay the head Programmer

- How to Play:
Objective- survive the infinite waves of bug monsters as long as possible while protecting your spaceship. 
If your spaceship is destroyed... You lose! Keep in mind your oxygen level. to keep it up stand near plants. You can only have 3 plants at a time. You can destroy the plants with you pickaxe.

- Controls:
-Switch inventory items with the scrollwheel
-Use the mouse to change your view.
-With the pickaxe selected hit to break minerals
-With the the gun click on the enemies to kill them

- How to download:
-You can play it on the itch.io web page just using WebGL: https://jhonxay.itch.io/kabloomatoids. You can also download it there if you'd like! Go on- what are you waiting for?

- Want to Judge on Ludum Dare?:

Here's the link: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/kabloomatoids

Have fun- your space journey awaits.
